localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Tesla has the 7th largest market cap of any company in the United States. 

It's bigger than Philip Morris, Starbucks, Boeing, and Citigroup combined. https://t.co/qE1Av7nokU
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
特斯拉的市值在美国所有公司中排名第七。

它比菲利普莫里斯、星巴克、波音和花旗集团加起来还要大。https://t.co/qE1Av7nokU

特斯拉的市值在美國所有公司中排名第七。

它比菲利普莫里斯、星巴克、波音和花旗集團加起來還要大。https://t.co/qE1Av7nokU

previous.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
previous.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!
